text: Soshite ware wa, kare no tame ni issai no jibutsu ni kansuru kunkai to, 凡 No koto no kaishaku to o,-hi no ue ni shirushite (itta). `Kore o shikkari mamore. Mata anata no hitobito ni, sono Chū no mottomo sugureta (michi) o mamoru yō meiji nasai. Ware wa omo no okite ni somuku mono no sumai o, yagate anata gata ni shimesudearou
